body: At 10th level, a psychonaut adds dream, lesser astral projection, nightmare, plane shift, sending, and telepathic bond to his formula book as 4th-level extracts (a plane shift extract does not require a focus component). This ability replaces poison immunity.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Spellcasting Class Options/Alchemist/Alchemist Archetypes/Psychonaut/Remote Consciousness
name: Remote Consciousness
